name: Attack on Alien
description:
Attack on Alien is a 2D retro-futurism Science-fantasy, environmental puzzle platformer. Where you the player navigates your way through levels while solving environmental puzzles. Players must think quickly if they want to make it out.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Game Features:

-  Platformer Puzzle Shooter

- 3 Levels

- Environmental puzzles

-  Intractable objects

- Enemies

---------------------------------------------------------------

This is still a work in progress, with 3 completed levels to play in.

This Early build version of the game and is free to play.
